alert.note: Alert for Kittitas Valley; Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 7:30PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kittitas County through 800 PM PDT... At 730 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thorp, or 10 miles west of Ellensburg, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ellensburg and Thorp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Kittitas Valley; Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest
